results.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
results.creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III, Roy Walker, Barry Levinson, Mark Johnson, Keith Denny, Mitch Markowitz and Larry Brezner
results.brief_description: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III, Roy Walker, Barry Levinson, Mark Johnson, Keith Denny, Mitch Markowitz and Larry Brezner
results.description: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers. After setting up shop, Cronauer delights the G.I.s but shocks his superior officer, Sergeant Major Dickerson, with his irreverent take on the war. While Dickerson attempts to censor Cronauer’s broadcasts, Cronauer pursues a relationship with a Vietnamese girl named Trinh, who shows him the horrors of war first-hand.
description_for_label: Radio funny man Adrian Cronauer is sent to Vietnam to bring a little comedy back into the lives of the soldiers. After setting up shop, Cronauer delights the G.I.s but shocks his superior officer, Sergeant Major Dickerson, with his irreverent take on the war. While Dickerson attempts to censor Cronauer’s broadcasts, Cronauer pursues a relationship with a Vietnamese girl named Trinh, who shows him the horrors of war first-hand.

results.title: Gone with the Wind
results.creator_credit: Sidney Howard, George Cukor, John Van Druten, William Cameron Menzies, Victor Fleming, Ben Hecht, David O. Selznick, Elmer Ellsworth, Sam Wood, Jo Swerling, Oliver H.P. Garrett, Eugene Joseff, Selznick International Pictures, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Walter Plunkett
results.brief_description: The spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner is forced to use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of poverty, following Maj. Gen. William Sherman’s destructive “March to the Sea,” during the American Civil War.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sidney Howard, George Cukor, John Van Druten, William Cameron Menzies, Victor Fleming, Ben Hecht, David O. Selznick, Elmer Ellsworth, Sam Wood, Jo Swerling, Oliver H.P. Garrett, Eugene Joseff, Selznick International Pictures, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Walter Plunkett
results.description: The spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner is forced to use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of poverty, following Maj. Gen. William Sherman’s destructive “March to the Sea,” during the American Civil War.
description_for_label: The spoiled daughter of a well-to-do plantation owner is forced to use every means at her disposal to claw her way out of poverty, following Maj. Gen. William Sherman’s destructive “March to the Sea,” during the American Civil War.

results.title: Gone Girl
results.brief_description: With his wife’s disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it’s suspected that he may not be innocent.

constellations_other.name: Women, crime and literature
constellations_other.description: Judy & Punch draws on a classic puppet show that's been reframed by director Mirrah Foulkes as a feminist tale, much like the works that put women at the centre in this Constellation.

results.description: With his wife’s disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it’s suspected that he may not be innocent.
description_for_label: With his wife’s disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it’s suspected that he may not be innocent.

results.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
results.creator_credit: Alex Garcia, Joe Howes, Reetu Aggarwal, Terry Rossio, Eric McLeod, Michael Dougherty, Eric Pearson, Max Borenstein, Thomas S. Hammock and Zach Shields
results.brief_description: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet clash in a spectacular battle for the ages.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Alex Garcia, Joe Howes, Reetu Aggarwal, Terry Rossio, Eric McLeod, Michael Dougherty, Eric Pearson, Max Borenstein, Thomas S. Hammock and Zach Shields
results.description: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet collide in a spectacular battle for the ages.
description_for_label: In a time when monsters walk the Earth, humanity’s fight for its future sets Godzilla and Kong on a collision course that will see the two most powerful forces of nature on the planet collide in a spectacular battle for the ages.

results.title: Glitter
results.creator_credit: E. Bennett Walsh and Dan Bishop
results.brief_description: A young woman is catapulted into pop stardom, with her already-famous DJ boyfriend calling the shots.
results.description: A young woman is catapulted into pop stardom, with her already-famous DJ boyfriend calling the shots.
description_for_label: A young woman is catapulted into pop stardom, with her already-famous DJ boyfriend calling the shots.

results.title: Gilmore Girls
results.brief_description: Set in the charming town of Stars Hollow, Connecticut, the series follows the captivating lives of Lorelai and Rory Gilmore, a mother/daughter pair who have a relationship most people only dream of.

constellations_other.name: 1950s television
constellations_other.description: "Good evening ... and welcome to television." Bruce Gyngell’s famous words launched television in Australia in 1956 on Sydney’s TCN9, with the medium finally arriving in the country towards the later end of the decade.

results.description: Set in the charming town of Stars Hollow, Connecticut, the series follows the captivating lives of Lorelai and Rory Gilmore, a mother/daughter pair who have a relationship most people only dream of.

results.title: Ghosts of the Abyss
results.headline_credit: Mexico and United States of America, 2003
results.brief_description: Academy Award® winning director and master storyteller James Cameron journeys back to the site of his greatest inspiration, the legendary wreck of the Titanic.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

results.description: With a team of the world’s foremost historic and marine experts as well as friend Bill Paxton, James Cameron embarks on an unscripted adventure back to the wreck of the Titanic where nearly 1,500 souls lost their lives almost a century ago.
description_for_label: With a team of the world’s foremost historic and marine experts as well as friend Bill Paxton, James Cameron embarks on an unscripted adventure back to the wreck of the Titanic where nearly 1,500 souls lost their lives almost a century ago.

results.title: Ghostbusters
results.brief_description: After losing their academic posts at a prestigious university, a team of parapsychologists goes into business as proton-pack-toting “ghostbusters” who exterminate ghouls, hobgoblins and supernatural pests of all stripes. An ad campaign pays off when a knockout cellist hires the squad to purge her swanky digs of demons that appear to be living in her refrigerator.

constellations_other.name: Dragon's Lair
constellations_other.description: A look at pop-cultural interconnections that spawn from the lair of Don Bluth's arcade classic.

results.description: After losing their academic posts at a prestigious university, a team of parapsychologists goes into business as proton-pack-toting “ghostbusters” who exterminate ghouls, hobgoblins and supernatural pests of all stripes. An ad campaign pays off when a knockout cellist hires the squad to purge her swanky digs of demons that appear to be living in her refrigerator.

results.title: Ghost in the Shell
results.creator_credit: Grosvenor Park Productions, Masamune Shirow and Bart Mueller
results.headline_credit: Australia, Canada, China, Hong Kong, India, Japan, New Zealand, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: a human saved from a terrible crash, then cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world’s most dangerous criminals.

constellations_other.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_other.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Grosvenor Park Productions, Masamune Shirow and Bart Mueller
results.headline_credit_for_label: Australia, Canada, China, Hong Kong, India, Japan, New Zealand, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.description: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: a human saved from a terrible crash, then cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world’s most dangerous criminals.

results.title: Get Out
results.brief_description: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family’s overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter’s interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

constellations_other.name: Sweet Country
constellations_other.description: Warwick Thornton’s feature film Sweet Country is based on the story of Wilaberta Jack, which was told to sound recordist David Tranter by his grandfather and translated into storyboards.

results.description: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family’s overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter’s interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.
